name: WebGL2RenderingContext.bindSampler
description: The WebGL2RenderingContext.bindSampler() method of the WebGL 2 API binds a passed WebGLSampler object to the texture unit at the passed index.

refs.name: WebGL 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'bindSampler' in the 'WebGL 2.0' specification.
